Title: 68786-EM-Add/Maintain Candidate-New Candidate registration with Non-registered Voter

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Election Management->Candidates->Search Candidates
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n  Search Candidates screen must be displayed \n successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter the Last Name and click on the "Search" \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n  Search results must be displayed \n successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Add"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n  Add new Candidate screen must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Use entered search criteria"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n  Maintain Candidate screen must be displayed \n successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter all the mandatory fields and click on Save button\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n  Candidate added successfully message must be \n displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Search"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: User must navigate to Search candidate screen\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Search with the newly added candidate last name\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Corresponding record must be displayed in the search results\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the Actions "Edit"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Maintain Candidate screen must be displayed successfully\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Party drop down is removed from Election & Office section\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Party drop down must be displayed in Candidate information section\n

Title: EM - Scan Screen Behavior and Button Update

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to 'Candidate Search' page
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for any user
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the 'Actions' button
Test Steps.Step Expected: 'Scan' option appears as an action

Test Steps.Step Action: Click the 'Scan' option
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Land on the 'Single Scan' page
Test Steps.Step Expected: Verify 'Document Name' is pre-populated with "Election Management". Verify 'Candidate Filing Application number' appears and is populated with the candidate number. Verify' Filing Date' appears and contains the application filing date.\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click the 'Document Type' dropdown
Test Steps.Step Expected: Verify The options 'Candidate Affidavit', 'TREASURER FORM', and 'other' appear and can be selected.

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to the 'Maintain Candidate' confirmation page
Test Steps.Step Expected: 'Scan' button is available at the bottom of the page beside 'Search'

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Scan'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on 'Single Scan' page.

Test Steps.Step Action: \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Expected: District drop down must be added to the Search Candidate Page

Test Steps.Step Action:
Select a district from the "District" drop down and
click "Search"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Corresponding records must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Add a new district in the District Management module
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Added district must displayed in the "District"
dropdown on Search Candidate Page

Title: EM - Candidate - View Election Management Documents

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to the 'Search Candidate' screen: EM > Candidates > Search Candidates
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on the 'Search Candidate' screen

Test Steps.Step Action: Wildcard search OR search for a specific user
Test Steps.Step Expected: Candidate(s) appear in the list

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' menu
Test Steps.Step Expected: 'Edit', 'Delete', and 'View/Scan' appear as actions

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'View/Scan'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on the 'Candidate Documents' page. 'Document Name', 'Date of Upload', and 'Actions' appear as grid items.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Scan'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on the 'View Candidate Registration' page

Test Steps.Step Action: Choose to 'Start New Scan' OR 'Load Local File', and select a scan/file to add to the index.
Test Steps.Step Expected: File appears in the 'Scanned Documents' Index

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Upload Documents'
Test Steps.Step Expected: File is successfully uploaded and notification is received.

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate back to the 'Candidate Documents' page
Test Steps.Step Expected: All uploaded documents are displayed in the list

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' for any uploaded document
Test Steps.Step Expected: 'View' and 'Delete' appear as actions.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'View'
Test Steps.Step Expected: The correct document is displayed in popup/modal

Test Steps.Step Action: Close the popup/modal
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' , then 'Delete'\n(Delete not yet implemented on 10-17, but will be in future) \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: The document is able to be deleted\n(Update this step with function/notification once impemented)
